Concept ACK (no hurt in adding a comment)

> The COIN constant is critical in understanding Bitcoin's supply

Interestingly, the only consensus-critical place it is used in is `GetBlockSubsidy`. I sometimes wonder if it should be. There is no 'bitcoin' at the protocol level, after all. Apart from there, it's used as a unit for RPC and the GUI only.
